data.text: @Cleavon_MD We had a family member die 2/11/22 in Montgomery AL from Covid. We send condolences to their family. 💔🙏🏻

"He survived 2 Kidney Transplants due to the selflessness of his donors, Jimmy Claxton and Amanda Johnson-Thomas. Thanks to their loving gift of Organ Donation, we were able to have 22 extra years with him."

Phillip was a minimalist and focused his attention on the people he loved the most, his devoted wife Julie and the Light of His Life, his daughter Ella, his loving parents Jimmy and Georgia Claxton, Phillip's brother Rodney and sister Holly.
He was a man of few words but could brighten anyone's mood with his dry sense of humor, funny wit and the ability to leave friends and family wondering what he may say next
